scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server:start" "wait-on tcp:3005 && npm run client:start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:watch" "wait-on tcp:3005 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.format: npm run format:server && npm run format:client
scripts.format:server: cd server && npm run format || true
scripts.format:client: cd client && npm run format || true
